adv:
The required views have been very helpful most of the time, as they have helped me find new patterns or verify some trends (e.g., movies with higher IMDB ratings also grid higher in the US), without needing to manually look these up.

The UI overall is also clean and easy to follow intuitively.
disadv:
The thickness of the circles is not easy to understand immediately.

The lack of grid lines made it difficult for me to follow some of the data distributions.
